name: Afrikan Arts Foundation
product_desc:
A Afrikan Arts Foundation é uma empresa social de gestão cultural empenhada em desafiar, desenvolver e promover o movimento artístico Moçambicano no cenário mundial para restaurar a identidade cultural dos nossos líderes criativos Africanos

Afrikan Arts Foundation is a cultural management social enterprise committed to challenge, develop & promote the Mozambican arts movement on the world stage to restore our creative African leaders' cultural identity.
high_concept: Promoting & managing talented Mozambican artists on the world stage.

name: Mocimboa Empreendimento Lda
product_desc:
Mocimboa Empreendimento is a Mozambican company focused on Agriculture, Commerce, Fishing and others on Cabo Delgado Province.
Owner of a land with more than 600 Hectares in The district of Mocimboa da Praia, approx 70km to Palma district where Internacional companies are doing Hydrocarbon exploration.
At this stage we are doing Ibo coffee, coconuts and beans plantation.
Ibo coffee is a unique and one of the most expensive coffee in the world, Particularly appreciated for its low caffeine level, Ibo coffee, once brewed, develops intense herbal flavors (mainly laurel, but also mint, eucalyptus and licorice), the distinguishing feature of this unique and interesting product.

We are open to new partners that are willing to invest in Mozambique.
high_concept: Agricultura: Ibo coffee, Coconuts and Beans.

name: Alpha Holdings Lda
product_desc:
Alpha Holdings has been awarded exclusive rights to produce and refine pure strain landrace sativa cannabis ( CBD ) oils and related products in Pemba, Mozambique. All licences are already in place and land reserved pending successful investment.
Alpha Holdings aims to be the largest, cheapest and highest quality producer and refiner of pure strain medicinal cannabis oils and related cannabis products in the world.
high_concept: Cannabis Oil Production and Refining

name: IOMA
product_desc:
We are promoting a new project in Mozambique. Is a property development for construction of 10 Houses in Matola, Mozambique, called Jangamo Village (Vila Jangamo in portuguese, our official language).

The luxuary houses contains, 3 suits (bedroom + bathroom+ closet), 1 living room, kitchen, toilet, office, garage for 2 cars. Total area more than 200 sqm each
The common area with pool, gym, security and commercial area. 

The place is located in a zone of expansion where the new trend for the natural development of the city is passing thru. 
We as company own the land, made the project and now we are managing the process to implement. 

- We are looking for investor to build it. We consider long term loans or investor to became a partner
- The estimated budget is around1.8 M USD for the whole construction.

This market in Mozambique is very profitable, considering other countries and we intend to do other projects across Maputo and Mozambique such as houses, resorts and offices towers.
high_concept: Business Development and Managing Company

name: Enko Benga International School
product_desc:
Enko Benga International School will provide high quality schooling and a much needed community asset, in the heart of Tete, Mozambique. The 400 person primary and secondary school will provide International Baccalaureate education at affordable ($3,000) fee levels, in addition to providing a robust scholarship programme. Through stellar partnerships with Enko Education (top-tier Africa based school operator), Wellington College (UK based private school), the University of Oxford and Kere Associates (globally renowned architects) we have a team that can deliver a school that is both relevant and replicable. 

Opening in January 2018 the for-profit social enterprise will be based within the Benga Riverside complex; a mixed use housing and community complex which aims to re-envisage the way high quality housing is developed in Sub-Saharan Africa. The school benefits from a captive student base, due to the lack of quality school provision in the region, alongside a growing local economy.
high_concept: New international school model in Mozambique

name: Wamina
product_desc: Wamina is a brand that aims to support the economic and social empowerment of Mozambican women and girls. Wamina motivates their development by providing fact-based information, products and services aimed at girls and women, and seeks solutions to everyday problems. It was in this context that the project "Wamina Girl" was created, the project provides reusable sanitary pads and educational workshops on menstrual hygiene management thus increasing girls’ self-esteem and self-confidence.
high_concept: Reusable Menstrual Pads

name: Champier Lda.
product_desc:
BlackBOX TV, its the good concept of tv for Africa, its like Netflix but it wont need internet... How great its that ??? :)

Imagine watching any content you want like, new movies, tv show's, reality shows...

You only will need to connect to the TV(HDMI or AV) and power for your happiness....

In Africa, particularly country's like mine (Mozambique), have big problems with communications like internet.
high_concept: Better then Netflix and made by an African

name: GMUSIC
product_desc:
In Mozambique finding local Music in an organized place is a problem, and other problem is only 4% of the musicians sell their music (via CD’s), that’s why a lot of local musicians end up poor or abandon music, and their music is not competitive because they lack money to afford quality.

Mozik lets users browse and stream local music (online and offline), read entertainment news and share their favorite content with friends inside Mozik and other social networks. 

We are in the soft-launch phase and have already partnered with Mobile Operator Vodacom, to charge the  user via a Data Bundle. 

We have a potential market of 1.000.000 users now and the market keeps growing, which makes us believe that by January 2017 we will have reached 10% of this potential market and will start generating 100.000 USD income monthly.
high_concept: First Mobile Music Streaming Service

name: FiberLink Networks, Lda. Mozambique
product_desc:
As profissionais and with proved experience (all founders with more done 12 years in Telecom experience) we provide a full range of solutions and implementations in Telecom, Networks and IT. These are part of the project on the roll:
Creation of the first open source ultra-fast broadband telecommunications network in Africa
Creation of national high-speed IPoDWDM Backbone
High-speed VSAT interconnections in Ka and Ku band
Interconnection of Universities and High Schools as well Hospitals, health centers and private clinics as well Immigration and Customs Service, Project EduRoam for Universities
NOC for customers, with managed services
Creation of equipment (micro-probes) for remote monitoring of customers
Implementation of a voice network (VoIP / SIP) for national and international operation
Nomadic telecommunications systems for special cases (catastrophes and proximity services to people)
Online Storage and Cloud Networking
Providing MIO (Mobile Internet Office)
high_concept: Welcome to the Future, Today!
markets: Internet Infrastructure, Networking, Internet of Things, Smart Mobile Solutions

name: FB & NOVINTE ENTERPRISE
product_desc: FB & NOVINTE INTERPRISES- is pro-profits Block Making Factory co. which aims to produce concrete blocks, tiles and other goods used in the construction industry for sale, in order to meet the growing market needs for construction industry in Africa precisely in the Republic of Mozambique. The FB & NOVINTE ENTERPRISES should also trigger the effectuation of construction of commercial, residential building activities, publishes and rehabilitation of roads and other services related to other infrastructure in general construction activities, and practice the import and export ofconstruction products, including raw materials and equipment, and may also participate in other companies. FB & NOVINTE ENTRPRISES aims to meet the growing demand from the construction market in Africa particularly in Mozambique where the undeniable growth of the economy and especially in the construction industry is notorious.
high_concept: Brick Making Factory- (Construction)

name: Khanimoz Investments, Lda
product_desc:
Khanimoz is to introduce  a network to facilitate electronic transactions and sales of prepaid services within Mozambican market called Pinpoint.

We aim to create a wide range of network to cater for cell phone users throughout the country, through the means of distribution and integration of non scratch cards airtime recharging vouchers, pre paid utilities, by offering solutions via VUT, Touch Screen Terminals, POS (Point of Sale), EFT or Internet, focused on expanding the availability of pre-paid services and acquisition, according to the needs of each of our partners: Cell phone Mobile companies, major retailers such as supermarket chains, and also smaller commercial establishments as well as street vendors. Pinpoint has the ability to apply diversified Prepaid Airtime Voucher Distribution onto POS (Point of Sale) terminals, Android Device and Laptop etc..
high_concept: Pinpoint (Blu label telecoms)

name: Red Lemon
product_desc:
Mozambique government is starting to take out plastic bags from circulation for ecological reasons.

With that in mind Red Lemon sees it as a huge opportunity to start manufacturing (sewing) reusable bags and distribute them to supermarkets, health clinics and all other places people need and use them. 

This will create many job opportunities, make clients save money and help to save the planet.

We pretend to start small and grow as the clientele grows. Step by step.
high_concept: Eco friendly reusable bags

Compra.co.mz is a Mozambican Online Marketplace for premium brands and quality products.

It allows approved vendors and distributors to place sell their products on the platform for a commission, much like the well-known Amazon.com Marketplace business model.

Compra differentiates itself from competitors by providing on the best quality products and partnerships, allowing clients to securely shop online and with all the benefits of the traditional stores and warranties.

name: Mozambikes, Lda
product_desc:
Mozambikes has designed a sturdy bicycle with features important to rural Africa, including a rear carrier, removable lantern and thicker tires. Mozambikes brands these bicycles with the colors and logos of companies, NGOs and other organizations, leveraging public and private sector funds to accomplish our mission.  

Bicycles have become the most innovative form or advertising, as they reach rural communities where no other media channels reach.  In urban areas, they are more effective than static ads and generate "loyalty" for the brand.  Mozambikes also serve for employee transportation and community social initiatives.

In Mozambique, 50% of the 23MM people live on less than $2 per day.  Bicycles provide access to income opportunities, healthcare and clean water.  However, existing bicycles are poor quality and still too expensive for the people who truly need them.  The Mozambikes model accomplishes this while filling a private sector need.
high_concept: Mozambikes is a for-profit social venture fighting poverty with BICYCLES

name: Agenda Mahala
product_desc:
Agenda Mahala
What is it?
Agenda Mahala is a web app that is an online calendar, planner, scheduler, shared calendar, that incorporates note taking, online storage, bookmark manager, ability to embed youtube videos and recorded audios, to do lists and to do lists management, which makes it perfect for College Students, Students and Workers, because they can save and keep tons of information in an organised fashion. They can keep notes, electronic books, links to relevant sites and more.

What does it do?
It organises the user's life and makes it easy to keep and retrieve information. It is like your personal internet, with all the links, files and youtube videos you care about. It is a great asset for a student, because he can keep information in his agenda that he will want to use in the future.
high_concept: Shared Agenda and Calendar for Students and College Students
